nodes.text: Sector 6472. X48 was a subsector located in the Lothal sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. Following the establishment of the Galactic Empire, the Lothal sector and its subsectors, including Sector 6472. X48, was ruled by the Empire and controlled by Governor Arihnda Pryce, a human female, from the planet Lothal, and Moff Stattata.
